person.name: Jimtastic
person.greeting: What can I help you with today?
person.introduction: I am Jimtastic. I like shoes!

person.name: Charisse Vidaca
person.introduction: I'm Charisse Vidaca! I have a brother named Donnie.

person.name: Donnie Vidaca
person.introduction: I'm Donnie. You may have met my sister Charisse.

person.name: Glen Leisenring
person.introduction: I am Glen. Who is asking?

person.name: Moses Hellams
person.introduction: I am Moses Hellams. I've been around.

person.name: Drek
person.introduction: I'm Drek Jeter. I am whom you think I am.

person.name: Sarah
person.introduction: I'm Sarah. Sure is great to meetcha!

person.name: Katherine
person.introduction: My name is Katherine. I'm kind of a big deal.

person.name: Jennifer
person.introduction: I am Jennifer. I like to think of myself as a coffee officionato.

person.name: Venice
person.introduction: I'm Venice Hyatt and you better not forget it!

person.name: Kanye
person.introduction: Call me Kanye of the West.

person.name: Myles Davydov
person.introduction: You don't know who I am? Really?

person.name: Seth
person.introduction: I'm Seth. I am totally a human. I love doing human things like consuming plant and animal matter.
